mutants.code:
def find_arrays_from_C(T, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, C) = case
        a = []
        b = []
        if max(C) != C[0]:
            results.append(-1)
            continue
        ma = C[0]
        n1 = -1
        for i in range(len(C)):
            if C[i] > ma:
                n1 = i
                break
        a = C[:n1]
        b = C[n1:]
        results.append(((len(a), a), (len(b), b)))
    return results

        a = C[:n1]
